name: Lightning Protocol
public_notice: Lightning (LIGHT) has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: The first fully deflationary elastic supply protocol which expands supply by 50% of the Tokens burnt through fees during each cycle.
